SYNTAX: local _StartAttack, lastAttackTime = ThePlayer.components.combat.StartAttack, GetTime() ThePlayer.components.combat.StartAttack = function(self, ...) TheNet:Announce(GetTime() - lastAttackTime) lastAttackTime = GetTime() _StartAttack(self, ...) end
DESCRIPTION: Show attack speed (interval between attacks in seconds). Replace ThePlayer with what you want the attack speed of. Tenticles don't work.

SYNTAX: local c=TheCamera; c.zoomstep=2; c.mindist=0; c.maxdist=180; c.mindistpitch=90; c.maxdistpitch=90; c.distance=1; c.distancetarget=1; c.fov=170;
DESCRIPTION: Set top-down camera with infinite zoom out.
Reset camera to default.
Spawn twins.
Spawn klaus.
Spawn antlion.
Spawn ink blights.
Spawn guaranteed correct Ancient Fuelweaver skeleton.
Spawn Ancient Fuelweaver that doesn't die when spawned. Spawns woven shadows and unseen hands around himself.
Spawn frostjaw.

SYNTAX: for i=1,8,1 do c_find("crabking").components.trader:AcceptGift(ThePlayer, c_spawn("purplegem")) end; c_find("crabking").components.trader:AcceptGift(ThePlayer, c_spawn("hermit_pearl"))
DESCRIPTION: Give 8 purple gems and a pearl to Crap King.
Spawn level 3 shadow rook, replace "rook" with other piece's name to spawn them and replace 3 with 2 for level 2.
Spawn a poison birchnut tree.

SYNTAX: local x, y, z = ConsoleWorldPosition():Get(); TheWorld:AddComponent("daywalkerspawner"); TheWorld.components.daywalkerspawner:SpawnDayWalkerArena(x, y, z)
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a Nightmare Werepig spawner.

SYNTAX: AddShardModRPCHandler(1, 1, function() TheWorld:PushEvent("ms_setphase", "night"); TheWorld:PushEvent("ms_setphase", "day") end); SendModRPCToShard(GetShardModRPC(1, 1), nil)
DESCRIPTION: Roll back the clock for a multi shard world.
Roll back clock for a single-shard/dsa world.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(AllPlayers) do for x=-1600,1600,35 do for y=-1600,1600,35 do v.player_classified.MapExplorer:RevealArea(x,0,y) end end end its pinned in seeds but putting it here too
DESCRIPTION: Reveal the map.
Spawn a rider beefalo.
Start a hound wave.
Spawn toadstool.
Spawn toadstool at the toadstool cap.
Start frog rain during spring in 1 minute, ending when you disconnect.
Make Dragonfly enraged.
Make Dragonfly unenraged.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.AnimState and v.AnimState:GetBuild() == "prefab1" then v.AnimState:OverrideSymbol("face", "prefab2","face") end end
DESCRIPTION: Swap character faces. Replace "prefab1" with your character and prefab2 with the face you want to swap to. Only works with default skin. Does not work with certain characters.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if not v:HasTag("CLASSIFIED") and v.Transform and not v:IsNear(ThePlayer, X * 4) then v:Remove() end end
DESCRIPTION: Clearing all entities not within some distance for reducing rollback/loading times Command for deleting everything that isn't within X tiles away from the player.
Spawn shadow meteor.

SYNTAX: c_select():DoPeriodicTask(0.1, function(inst) if inst.components.combat:InCooldown() then inst.AnimState:SetMultColour(1, 0, 0, 1) else inst.AnimState:SetMultColour(0, 1, 0, 1) end end)
DESCRIPTION: Make a target red when its attack is on cooldown.
Set character sound you want emitted.
Announce multiple stuff at once.
Announce Reeds count.
Announce Totally Normal Tree count.
Announce Killer bee count.
Disconnect.
Announce world seed.
Spawns fish with specified weight. Replace "prefab" with prefab of fish, for example "ocean_fish_medium_2_inv". Replace x with weight.
Resets scrapbook. Run on main menu, or disconnect after using for it to go into effect, it will temporarily show 100% scrapbook.
Spawn a fuelweaver minion that tries to walk towards fuelweaver.
Change durability of a non-armor boon item on character select.
Change durability of armor boon item on character select.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.prefab == "panflute" and v.components.finiteuses:GetPercent() < 1 then v.components.finiteuses:SetPercent(0.7) end end
DESCRIPTION: Change durability of panflute boon item on character select. Panflute is assumed to not have 100% durrability, and therefore does not change glommer flute.

SYNTAX: local prefab = "twigs"; local eyecolor = "purple"; for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.prefab == prefab then local instlense = SpawnPrefab(eyecolor.."mooneye"); instlense.Physics:ClearCollidesWith(COLLISION.OBSTACLES); instlense.Transform:SetPosition(v.Transform:GetWorldPosition()); end end
DESCRIPTION: Place a moonlens ontop of every twig in the world.
Set max health.
Set health as a percentage of max health.
Make the game x times faster.
Go to character selection screen. All unlocked recepies will be reset. You will spawn back at Florid Postern.
Go to specific prefab.
Teleport to cursor.
Start rain. Does not set wetness.
Make world wet.
Spawn a prefab that doesnt sink. Replace "prefab" with an item.
Spawn Florid Postern.

SYNTAX: local x,y,z = ThePlayer.Transform:GetWorldPosition();c_announce(string.format("x:%.2f, y:%.2f, z:%.2f", x, y, z));
DESCRIPTION: Announce your position.

SYNTAX: local x,y,z = ConsoleWorldPosition():Get();c_announce(string.format("x:%.2f, y:%.2f, z:%.2f", x, y, z));
DESCRIPTION: Announce the cursor's position.

SYNTAX: local prefabname = "pigman"; local pos = {x = 0, y = 0, z = 0}; local poschanged = false; if pos.x ~= 0 or pos.y ~= 0 or pos.z ~= 0 then poschanged = true end; c_supergodmode();c_supergodmode();c_emptyworld(); if poschanged then local prefab = SpawnPrefab(prefabname); prefab.Transform:SetPosition(pos.x,pos.y,pos.z); else local prefab = DebugSpawn(prefabname); end;
DESCRIPTION: DELETE EVERYTHING and start enemy practice.
Set damage multiplier.
Announce an enemy's health.
Announce selected enemy's health.
Announce enemy's remaining health as a fraction.

SYNTAX: local crab = c_findnext("hermitcrab") local crabfriendly = crab.components.friendlevels for i = 1, 10, 1 do local task = crabfriendly.friendlytasks[i] task.complete = false crabfriendly:CompleteTask(i) end
DESCRIPTION: Set pearl friendship. Complete all possible tasks by changing 10 to 18.

SYNTAX: local crab = c_findnext("hermitcrab") local crabfriendly = crab.components.friendlevels c_announce(crabfriendly:GetLevel().."/"..crabfriendly:GetMaxLevel())
DESCRIPTION: Get Crabby Hermit friendship level.
Start moonstorms.
Spawn a watering can or other prefabs at 100%.

SYNTAX: local function a(a, b) local c = a.components.health.maxhealth; a.Label:SetText(c*b.newpercent.."/"..c) end; for k,v in pairs(Ents) do local b = v.components.health; if b then local c = v.entity:AddLabel(); c:SetFont(BODYTEXTFONT); c:SetFontSize(24); v:ListenForEvent("healthdelta", a); b:DoDelta(0) end end
DESCRIPTION: Make each entity say their hp.
Link spawned Ancient Fuelweaver to the gateway. If it doesn't work swap the positions of "stargate" and c_find("atrium_gate").

SYNTAX: local curday = os.date("%d", os.time()); if tonumber(curday) < 10 then curday = string.sub(curday, 2, 2); end local curdate = os.date("%B "..curday..", %Y ", os.time()); local curhour = tonumber(os.date("%H", os.time())); local curhourmod = ((curhour-1)%12)+1; local curminute = os.date("%M ", os.time()); if curhour < 12 then curampm = "AM"; else curampm = "PM"; end c_announce(curdate..curhourmod..":"..curminute..curampm)
DESCRIPTION: Announce the current date.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.gemmed then local inst = SpawnPrefab(string.sub(v.gemmed, 1, -4).."mooneye"); inst.Physics:ClearCollidesWith(COLLISION.OBSTACLES); inst.Transform:SetPosition(v.Transform:GetWorldPosition()) end end
DESCRIPTION: Add a moonlens to every ruins statue corresponding to its gem color. May get pushed off when loaded.
Spawn objects to rounded position (per in-game unit).

SYNTAX: local function multipleof(number, multiple) local moddiv = (number + multiple/2)/multiple; return multiple*math.floor(moddiv); end local function snapspawn(prefab, mult) local x,y,z = ConsoleWorldPosition():Get(); local inst = SpawnPrefab(prefab); inst.Transform:SetPosition(multipleof(x, mult),multipleof(y, mult),multipleof(z, mult)); end snapspawn("basalt_pillar", 4);
DESCRIPTION: Spawn basalt pillar rounded to closest tile.

SYNTAX: local function entcircle(prefab, radius, precision) local mpos = Vector3(ConsoleWorldPosition():Get()); for i = 0, 360-(360/precision), 360/precision do local inst = SpawnPrefab(prefab); local pos = {x = radius*math.sin(math.rad(i)), y = 0, z = radius*math.cos(math.rad(i))}; inst.Transform:SetPosition(mpos.x+pos.x,0,mpos.z+pos.z); print(pos.x,pos.z) end end entcircle("beefalo", 20, 9);
DESCRIPTION: Spawn beefalo in circle.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.prefab == "a" then ReplacePrefab(v, "b") end end
DESCRIPTION: Replace all existing entities with new entity. Example replaces "a" with "b".
Spawn a moonlens at 0,0,0.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(AllPlayers) do for x=-1600,1600,35 do for y=-1600,1600,35 do v.player_classified.MapExplorer:RevealArea(x,0,y) end end end
DESCRIPTION: Reveal the map.
Unlock entire scrapbook. Works inside a world, may take some time to update.

SYNTAX: function migrate(id, p) for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.prefab == "cave_entrance" or v.prefab == "cave_exit" then local wm = v.components.worldmigrator if wm.id == id or 1 then TheWorld:PushEvent("ms_playerdespawnandmigrate", { player = p or ThePlayer, portalid = id or 0, worldid = wm.linkedWorld }) end end end end migrate()
DESCRIPTION: Move to the other shard quickly. Extra features: migrate(3, AllPlayers[3]) takes the second joined player to the other third connection. By default it takes MasterSim (world owner) to the other shard's portal (cause 0 is always an invalid id).

SYNTAX: AddClassPostConstruct("screens/playerhud", function(self) local redundantpause = false local redundantunpause = false local OnUpdate_new = self.OnUpdate self.OnUpdate = function(...) OnUpdate_new(...) if self.serverpaused then if not redundantpause then ThePlayer:PushEvent("multiplayerpaused") redundantpause = true redundantunpause = false end else if not redundantunpause then ThePlayer:PushEvent("multiplayerunpaused") redundantunpause = true redundantpause = false end end return end end)
DESCRIPTION: Retrieve the cave seed in the forest shard and vice versa.
Announce current world type.
Get spiced food, where xyz is the food name.
Get honey spice.
Get chili flakes.
Count every Walrus camp on world.
Turn off the AI of the entity under the cursor. Entity will still keep moving if it moved beforehand.
Stop the entity that is under the cursor.

SYNTAX: for _,p in pairs(Ents) do if p.prefab ~= "rabbit" then local pb = p.brain local pc = p.components local pcl = pc.locomotor if pb then pb:Stop() end if pc and pcl then pcl:Stop() end end end
DESCRIPTION: Turn off brains. Brains may turn on again after some time.
Set a mob to a specific hp threshold for phases and such.
Make a new portal that goes to the caves.
Spawning in a functional scrappy werepig. Can ommit 1st line if you want to use the junkyard that already exists.

SYNTAX: local gri_real = GetRandomItem GetRandomItem = function() return "greengem" end c_spawn("ruins_statue_head") GetRandomItem = gri_real
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a statue with a specific gem.
Set your speed to a specific multiplier where x is a multiplier of base speed (so 3 is 18 speed, for example).
Show wetness of dragon fly.
Add x to the boss's moisture.
Set boss mosture.

SYNTAX: local size = TheWorld.Map:GetSize(); local land_count = 0; for x = -0.5*size, 0.5*size do for z = -0.5*size, 0.5*size do if TheWorld.Map:IsLandTileAtPoint(4*x, 0, 4*z) then land_count = land_count+1; end end end c_announce(land_count)
DESCRIPTION: Display how many land tiles there are in a world.
Spawn a fancy potato.
Spawn a periodic enemy spawner.
Spawn a fire starter festive light.
Trojan horse trinket that impales the user.
Spawn a custom walking cane.

SYNTAX: local orchard = c_spawn("deciduoustree_tall"); orchard:AddComponent("pickable"); orchard.components.pickable:SetUp("meat", 2, 4); orchard.components.pickable.jostlepick = true; orchard.components.pickable.droppicked = true; orchard.components.pickable.dropheight = 25;
DESCRIPTION: Tree that summons meat from the sky.

SYNTAX: local orchard = c_spawn("cavein_boulder"); orchard:AddComponent("pickable"); orchard.components.pickable:SetUp("lobster_sheller_land", 2, 1); orchard.components.pickable.jostlepick = true; orchard.components.pickable.droppicked = true; orchard.components.pickable.dropheight = 0;
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a boulder that spawns wobsters.

SYNTAX: local orchard = c_spawn("cavein_boulder"); orchard:AddComponent("pickable"); orchard.components.pickable:SetUp("gift_wrap", 2, 2); orchard.components.pickable.jostlepick = true; orchard.components.pickable.droppicked = true; orchard.components.pickable.dropheight = 25;
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a boulder that spawns gift wrap.

SYNTAX: local orchard = c_spawn("cavein_boulder"); orchard:AddComponent("pickable"); orchard.components.pickable:SetUp("wortox_soul", 2, 25); orchard.components.pickable.jostlepick = true; orchard.components.pickable.droppicked = true; orchard.components.pickable.dropheight = 2;
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a healing boulder. Heals via Wortox souls.
Spawn a berry that turns into meat when cooked.

SYNTAX: local poop = c_spawn("meat"); poop:AddComponent("edible"); local function oneaten_raw(inst, eater) local yummity = eater.Transform:GetScale() / 1.25 eater.Transform:SetScale(yummity, yummity, yummity) end; poop.components.edible:SetOnEatenFn(oneaten_raw)
DESCRIPTION: Spawn food that makes players bigger.

SYNTAX: local elemental = c_spawn("cane"); elemental:AddComponent("periodicspawner"); elemental.components.periodicspawner:SetPrefab("shadowmeteor"); elemental.components.periodicspawner:SetRandomTimes(2, 1); elemental.composnents.periodicspawner:SetDensityInRange(10, 2); elemental.components.periodicspawner:SetMinimumSpacing(0); elemental.components.periodicspawner:Start(); elemental:AddComponent("named") elemental.components.named:SetName("Meteor Cane") elemental.components.equippable.walkspeedmult = 2 ThePlayer.AnimState:SetBuild("character") ThePlayer.AnimState:SetBuild("wes")
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a walking cane that summons meteors to destroy itself.
Spawn a berry that turns into meat when cooked.

SYNTAX: local wand = c_spawn("phlegm");wand:AddComponent("weapon") ; wand.components.weapon:SetDamage(0); wand.foleysound = "dontstarve/movement/foley/jewlery";wand:AddTag("thrown"); wand.components.weapon:SetProjectile("spat_bomb"); wand.components.weapon:SetRange(11, 14);wand:AddComponent("equippable"); wand.components.equippable.equipslot = EQUIPSLOTS.HANDS;wand:RemoveComponent("stackable");
DESCRIPTION: Spawn a Phlegm wand.

SYNTAX: for k, v in pairs(AllPlayers) do v.sg:GoToState("emote", { anim = { "emote_pre_carol", "emote_loop_carol", }, fx = false, loop = true, mounted = true, sounddelay = 0.8, soundlooped = true, soundoverride = "carol" }) end
DESCRIPTION: Everyone uses carol emote.

SYNTAX: local beef = c_spawn("beefalo"); beef.components.beard.daysgrowth = 0 ;beef.components.beard.bits = 20 ; beef.components.beard.prize = "glommerfuel"; beef.components.hunger:DoDelta(400); beef.components.domesticatable:DeltaTendency("ORNERY", 1); beef:SetTendency(); beef.components.domesticatable.domestication = 1; beef.components.domesticatable:BecomeDomesticated(); beef.components.brushable.prize = "slurper";
DESCRIPTION: Spawn beefalo that can be shaved for glommer goop.
Delete item under mouse cursor.
Resurrect all players.
Link two wormholes.
Go to wormhole.
Announce distance between Florid Postern and the Chester Eyebone.
Spawn the metheus puzzle chest.
Spawn prefab under mouse cursor.
Get any amount of item.
Get a set of starting items.
Apply a scenario script to the selection and run it.
Set your health to half of maximum.
Set your sanity to half of maximum.
Set hunger to half of maximum.
Set your moisture to half of maximum.
Set temperature to half of maximum.
If alive, toggle invincibility. If dead, revive.
If alive, toggle invincibility and get full health, sanity and hunger. If dead, revive.
Make yourself constantly regenerate health.
Make yourself constantly regenerate sanity.
Make yourself constantly regenerate hunger.
Make yourself constantly be a good temperature.
Make yourself constantly be dry.
Turn on constant regeneration of health, sanity, hunger, temperature, and drying.
Turn off constant regeneration of health, sanity, hunger, temperature, and drying.
Make some mobs not target you.
Turn on player movement prediction for the server you have joined. Exchanges choppiness for rubberbanding.
Turn off player movement prediction for the server you have joined. Exchanges rubberbanding for choppiness.
Become able to craft anything.
Set max sanity.
Set max hunger.
Pause Hunger.

SYNTAX: for i, v in ipairs(AllPlayers) do TheNet:SystemMessage(tostring(i) .. ": " .. v.name, false) end
DESCRIPTION: Print the player list to the chat.
Get a certain player.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(AllPlayers) do command end
DESCRIPTION: Apply a command to all players.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(AllPlayers) do c_move(v) end
DESCRIPTION: Move all players to mouse position.
Teleport another player to mouse position.
Kill a player.
Kill the second player.
Kill player named Dave.
Resurrect a player.
Resurrect the second player.
Resurrect the player named Dave.
Give creative mode to a player.
Give creative mode to the player named Dave.
Teleport to a player.
Teleport to the second player.
Teleport to the player named Dave.
Drop a player's inventory items.
Drop the second player's inventory items.
Drop Dave's inventory items.
Despawn a player's character. Player returns to selection screen for repicking. Does delete player's items.
Despawn Dave's character. Player returns to selection screen for repicking. Does delete player's items.
Delete the item under your mouse on non-dedicated servers.
Delete the item under your mouse on a dedicated server.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(Ents) do if v.prefab == "prefab" then v:Remove() end end
DESCRIPTION: Deletes every instance of whatever item prefab is entered.

SYNTAX: minimap = TheSim:FindFirstEntityWithTag("mini­map") TheWorld.minimap.MiniMap:ShowArea (0,0,0,10000) for x=-1600,1600,35 do for y=-1600,1600,35 do ThePlayer.player_classified.MapExplorer:RevealArea(x,0,y) end end
DESCRIPTION: Reveal map. Will not work if you are a client.

SYNTAX: for k,v in pairs(AllPlayers) do for x=-1600,1600,35 do for y=-1600,1600,35 do v.player_classified.MapExplorer:RevealArea(x,0,y) end end end
DESCRIPTION: Reveal map for all players. Remote only, not client.
Skips X time units and performs the "LongUpdate" function on world objects.
Skip X time segments.
Skip X day, where a day is 16 segments, each being 30 time units.
Skip X days.
Speed up the simulation of world by 1. Makes time pass faster.
Speed up the simulation of world by X. Makes time pass faster when X>1, slower when X<1, pause when X=0.
Skip X Time Units. Too big values may freeze the game.
Skip X Time Segments. Too big values may freeze the game.
Skip X days. Too big values may freeze the game.
Skip X days. Too big values may freeze the game.
Skip to the next Day Cycle.
Skips the current Day Cycle phase.
Set Day Cycle phase to PHASE. PHASE can be "day", "dusk", or "night".
Sets amount of segments for day X, dusk Y, and night Z. Lasts only for the current Day Cycle. Errors if X+Y+Z > 16.
Skip to the next Nightmare Cycle.
Skip the current Nightmare Cycle phase.
Set Nightmare Cycle phase. PHASE can be "calm", "warn", "wild", or "dawn".
Sets amount of segments for each phase in the Nightmare Cycle. A, B, C, and D can be any number. The default is {calm=12,warn=3,wild=5,dawn=2}.
Lock at specific Nightmare Cycle phase. PHASE can be "calm", "warn", "wild", or "dawn".
Stop locking nightmare phase.
Set season segments. Errors if X + Y + Z adds up to over 16.
Set the length of summer to L.
Start summer.
Start Winter.
Start rain.
Stop rain and Frog Rain.
Create lightning strike on mouse cursor or a nearby lightning rod.
Meteor strike on mouse cursor. Spawns different kind of rocks randomly. WARNING: May crash the game.

SYNTAX: for k, v in pairs(SPECIAL_EVENTS) do if v ~= SPECIAL_EVENTS.NONE then local tech = TECH[k] if tech ~= nil then tech.SCIENCE = 0 end end end function IsSpecialEventActive(event) return true end
DESCRIPTION: Activate all Events.
Show the distance between the player and an object under the mouse cursor to the console log.
Kick a player using their UserID. UserIDs are in the form "KU_AABBCCDD".
Ban a player using their UserID. UserIDs are in the form "KU_AABBCCDD".
List all players in the world. Outputs each player's Player Index, UserID, name, and character. UserIDs are in the form KU_AABBCCDD.
Ban a player using their Player INDEX.

Temporarily Ban a player for X seconds using their UserID. UserIDs are in the form "KU_AABBCCDD". This command should be entered to both servers if server has multi-level option (caves and overworld).
Connect to a password-less server with IP address (like "10.0.0.8"), and select PORT, normally 10999, since it's the default.
Connect to a server with PASSWORD, like "123", and IP address, like "10.0.0.8", and select PORT, normally 10999, since it's the default.
Reloads the world without saving. WARNING: This command may crash your game if you are a client, unless you send it as a remote command.
Regenerate the world.
Regenerate the current world shard.
Save the server.
Save and shut down the server.
Shut down the server without saving.
Roll back the server to the last save.
Roll back the server by an X amount of saves.
Disallow players to join.
Allow players to join.
Make a server announcement saying TEXT like "Hello everyone".
Drop a player's inventory items using their Player Index.
Move another player using their Player Index.
Despawn a player's character, returning them to selection screen for repicking, using their Player Index.
Stop a vote.
Change the appeard length X, width Y, and height Z of the thing closest to the mouse cursor. Only applies to you, not other players.
Clear the morgue. Requires closing and reopening the game for changes to be seen.
Count the number of something in the entire world.
Speak the text T, like "Hello".
Count the number of something X, like "spear", in either the surroundings or the world. Surroundings when used locally, the world When using remote.

SYNTAX: worm1 = c_spawn("wormhole") worm2 = c_spawn("wormhole") worm1.components.teleporter.targetTeleporter = worm2 worm2.components.teleporter.targetTeleporter = worm1
DESCRIPTION: Spawn connected wormholes ontop of you. Execute one at a time so the wormholes aren't spawned ontop of eachother.
Spawn a Domesticated Beefalo with a specific TENDENCY, options are "DEFAULT", "RIDER", "ORNERY", "PUDGY".
Teleport something X, like "flower", to the player with the Player Index Y.
Set the player's length X, width Y, and height Z.
Set whatever is closest to the mouse cursor's length X, width Y, and height Z. The target is the mob closest to the mouse cursor.
Set player's color as Red, Green, Blue, and Transparency. Colors have to be >0 and <257.
Set whatever is closest to the mouse cursor's color as Red, Green, Blue, and Transparency. Colors have to be >0 and <257.
Makes prefab under mouse pick-up-able. Usually crashes the game if mods are enabled. Picking up a player does cause the game to crash for the player being picked up.

Set a Body Part to be another character's bodypart. Bodypart can be "arm_lower", "arm_upper", "arm_upper_skin", "cheeks", "face", "foot", "hair", "hair_hat", "hairpigtails", "hairfront", "hand", "headbase", "headbase_hat", "leg", "skirt", "tail", or "torso". Character name can to take the bodypart from can be any character name, like "webber", "wilson", "wx78", but if you need Maxwell, then use "waxwell", and for Wigfrid use "wathgrithr".
Fully unlock the scrapbook.
Reset Ancient Gateway Key cooldown.
